statements: SELECT * FROM dispute_resolution_cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_description, dispute_type, outcome FROM dispute_resolution_cases WHERE resolution_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT case_id, dispute_type FROM dispute_resolution_cases WHERE outcome = 'Settled';
SELECT * FROM dispute_resolution_cases WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2021-12-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT resolution_date, outcome FROM dispute_resolution_cases WHERE dispute_type = 'Arbitration';
SELECT * FROM dispute_resolution_cases ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT case_description, outcome FROM dispute_resolution_cases WHERE dispute_type = 'Arbitration';
SELECT COUNT(case_id) AS total_cases FROM dispute_resolution_cases;
SELECT * FROM dispute_resolution_cases WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, case_description, resolution_date FROM dispute_resolution_cases WHERE outcome = 'Settled' ORDER BY resolution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM DisputeCases;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM DisputeCases ORDER BY case_name DESC;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM DisputeCases WHERE case_status = 'active';
SELECT case_name, case_description, case_status FROM DisputeCases WHERE case_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CaseOutcomes WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY resolution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM DisputeCases WHERE case_status = 'resolved';
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM DisputeCases WHERE case_status = 'pending' ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM DisputeCases WHERE case_status = 'ongoing' AND case_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY case_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CaseOutcomes WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01' AND outcome_result = 'successful' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;

SELECT DisputeCases.case_id, DisputeCases.case_name, CaseOutcomes.outcome_result FROM DisputeCases INNER JOIN CaseOutcomes ON DisputeCases.case_id = CaseOutcomes.case_id WHERE case_status = 'pending' ORDER BY CaseOutcomes.resolution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM DisputeCases;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM DisputeCases WHERE case_status = 'pending';
SELECT case_name, participant_name, participant_role FROM DisputeCases JOIN CaseParticipants ON DisputeCases.case_id = CaseParticipants.case_id;
SELECT * FROM DisputeCases WHERE case_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT participant_name, outcome_description FROM CaseParticipants JOIN CaseOutcomes ON CaseParticipants.case_id = CaseOutcomes.case_id;
SELECT * FROM DisputeCases;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM DisputeCases WHERE case_status = 'pending';
SELECT outcome_id, outcome_description, outcome_date FROM CaseOutcomes ORDER BY outcome_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, participant_name, participant_role FROM CaseParticipants WHERE participant_role = 'plaintiff' ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT c.case_name, p.participant_name, o.outcome_description FROM DisputeCases c JOIN CaseParticipants p ON c.case_id = p.case_id JOIN CaseOutcomes o ON c.case_id = o.case_id;
SELECT * FROM dispute_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_title, filed_date FROM dispute_cases;
SELECT party_id, party_name, party_type FROM parties_involved WHERE party_type = 'Plaintiff';
SELECT outcome_id, case_id, resolution_status FROM case_outcomes ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT comment_id, case_id, commenter_name, comment_date FROM case_comments WHERE case_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM dispute_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_title, filed_date FROM dispute_cases WHERE filed_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties_involved JOIN dispute_cases ON parties_involved.case_id = dispute_cases.case_id WHERE dispute_cases.case_title LIKE '%dispute%';
SELECT case_id, resolution_status, resolution_date FROM case_outcomes WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT cc.comment_id, cc.comment_text, cc.commenter_name, dc.case_title FROM case_comments cc JOIN dispute_cases dc ON cc.case_id = dc.case_id WHERE cc.comment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DisputeCases;
SELECT case_name, case_status FROM DisputeCases WHERE case_status='Pending';
SELECT party_name, party_role FROM CaseParties ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM CaseDocuments LIMIT 5;
SELECT case_id, activity_description, activity_date FROM CaseActivities WHERE case_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM DisputeCases WHERE case_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM CaseParties WHERE party_role = 'Defendant' ORDER BY party_id DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_type, document_location FROM CaseDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Legal' LIMIT 5;
SELECT case_id, activity_description, activity_date FROM CaseActivities WHERE case_id = 1001 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT case_id, outcome, outcome_date FROM CaseOutcomes WHERE outcome = 'Settled' AND case_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003) ORDER BY outcome_date DESC;
